events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in days and I am very frustrated about this delay.
The system has categorized this case under Delivery Delay due to the mention of late shipment and tracking issues.
A customer service agent has been assigned to investigate the reported delivery delay and provide assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your package hasn't arrived yet. I'll do my best to help get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the tracking number so I can look into the status with the shipping carrier?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and the tracking number is ZX987654321US. The tracking page hasn't updated for over a week.
Thank you for the details. I've contacted the carrier and requested a status update on your shipment. If the package is lost, we will arrange a replacement or a refund immediately.
I appreciate you looking into this so quickly. Please keep me updated on what the carrier says. Thanks for your help!
We received confirmation that your package was delayed in transit but is now on its way. It should arrive within 2 days. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm your package was delivered and if you are satisfied with the resolution of your delivery delay issue.
